article:
'[[Existence]]' is a concept in metaphysics.

'Existence' may also refer to:
* ''Existence'' (Dark Suns album)
* ''Existence'' (Beto VÃ¡zquez Infinity album)
* "Existence" (''The X-Files''), a 2001 television episode
* [[eXistenZ]], a 1999 horror science-fiction film
* [[The Existence]], a 2004 EP release by Forever Changed

'Existential' can mean "relating to existence" or "relating to
'[[existentialism]]'". It is used in particular to refer to: *Existential
quantification, in logic and mathematics (symbolized by â) *Existential clause,
in linguistics *Existential crisis *Existential fallacy *Existential humanism
*Existential forgery *Existential risk *Existential therapy *Existential graph
*Existential phenomenology
